name: Flexor
description:
Flexor is a 100% Mexican independent company, founded with the objective of developing a divergent offer in the business software and telecommunications market in Mexico and Latin America. We have become a leading company in technological innovation and systems, product of the great human, creative and technological potential that make up the company.
Headquartered in the city of Guadalajara, Jalisco and more than 10 years of experience, we have become the main differentiator of the industry in the technology market, derived from the great effort, research and joint commitment.
